title: Fasilitator React - Level Menengah
description: As a Fasilitator, my role was pivotal in guiding and mentoring participants of IDCamp 2023 through the intricacies of the React learning path at an intermediate level. My primary objective was to ensure that each participant not only comprehended but also mastered the concepts, enabling them to successfully complete the course with proficiency and within the stipulated timeframe. Through a combination of hands-on guidance, constructive feedback, and fostering a collaborative learning environment, I aimed to empower participants to excel in their React development skills. The experience was not just about conveying knowledge but also about cultivating a supportive and conducive atmosphere for optimal learning outcomes.

title: Bangkit Academy 2024 By Google, GoTo, Traveloka - Cloud Computing Learning Path
